    • Constructor Detail

      • AlertThresholds

        public AlertThresholds(Detection3D detector,
                       double alerting_time,
                       double late_alerting_time,
                       BandsRegion region)
        Creates an alert threholds object. Parameter det is a detector, alerting_time is a non-negative alerting time (possibly positive infinity), late_alerting_time is a late alerting time >= at (for maneuver guidance), region is the type of guidance

        public double getAlertingTime()
        Return alerting time in seconds.

      • setAlertingTime

        public void setAlertingTime(double t)
        Set alerting time in seconds. Alerting time is non-negative number.

        Return late alerting time in seconds.

      • setLateAlertingTime

        public void setLateAlertingTime(double t)
        Set late alerting time in seconds. Late alerting time is a positive number >= alerting time

        Return guidance region.

      • getTrackSpread

        public double getTrackSpread()
        Get track spread in internal units [rad]. Spread is relative to ownship's track

      • getTrackSpread

        public double getTrackSpread(java.lang.String u)
        Get track spread in given units [u]. Spread is relative to ownship's track

      • setTrackSpread

        public void setTrackSpread(double spread)
        Set track spread in internal units. Spread is relative to ownship's track and is expected to be in [0,pi].

      • setTrackSpread

        public void setTrackSpread(double spread,
                           java.lang.String u)
        Set track spread in given units. Spread is relative to ownship's track and is expected to be in [0,pi] [u].

      • getGroundSpeedSpread

      • setGroundSpeedSpread

        Set ground speed spread in internal units [m/s]. Spread is relative to ownship's ground speed and is expected to be non-negative
